Verses: 1 ivaigalukkuppinbu, Idho, Paralogaththil Thirakkappattirundha Oru Vaasalaik Kanden. Munne Ekkaalasaththampola Ennudane Pesa Naan Kettirundha Saththamaanadhu: Inge Erivaa, Ivaigalukkuppinbu Sambavikkavendiyavaigalai Unakkuk Kaanbippen Endru Vilambinadhu.
2 udane Aavikkullaanen; Appozhudhu, Idho, Vaanaththil Oru Singaasanam Vaikkappattirundhadhu, Andhach Singaasanaththinmel Oruvar Veetrirundhaar.
3 veetrirundhavar, Paarvaikku Vachchirakkallukkum Padhumaraakaththukkum Oppaayirundhaar; Andhach Singaasanaththaichsutri Oru Vaanavillirundhadhu; Adhupaarvaikku Maragadhampola Thondritru.

4 andhach Singaasanaththaich Soozha Irubaththunaangu Singaasanangalirundhana; Irubaththunaangu Mooppargal Venvasthirandhariththu, Thangal Sirasugalil Ponmudi Soodi Andhach Singaasanangalinmel Utkaarndhirukkakkanden.
5 andhach Singaasanaththilirundhu Minnalgalum Idimuzhakkangalum Saththangalum Purappattana; Dhevanudaiya Ezhu Aavigalaagiya Ezhu Akkini Theepangal Singaasanaththirku Munbaaga Erindhukondirundhana.

6 andhach Singaasanaththirku Munbaagap Palingukkoppaana Kannaadikkadalirundhadhu; Andhach Singaasanaththin Maththiyilum Andhach Singaasanaththaich Sutrilum Naanku Jeevangalirundhana, Avaigal Munburaththilum Pinburaththilum Kangalaal Niraindhirundhana.
7 mudhalaam Jeevan Singaththirkoppaagavum, Irandaam Jeevan Kaalaikkoppaagavum, Moondraam Jeevan Manushamugampondra Mugamulladhaagavum, Naangaam Jeevan Parakkira Kazhukukku Oppaagavumirundhana.

8 andha Naangu Jeevangalilum Ovvondru Avvaaru Sirakugalullavaigalum, Sutrilum Ulleyum Kangalaal Niraindhavaigalumaayirundhana. Avaigal: Irundhavarum Irukkiravarum Varugiravarumaagiya Sarvavallamaiyulla Dhevanaagiya Karththar Parisuththar Parisuththar Parisuththar Endru Iravum Pagalum Oivillaamal Sollikkondirundhana.
9 melum, Singaasanaththinmel Veetrirundhu, Sadhaakaalangalilum Uyirodirukkiravarukku Andha Jeevangal, Magimaiyaiyum Kanaththaiyum Sthoththiraththaiyum Seluththumpodhu,

10 irubaththunaangu Mooppargalum Singaasanaththinmel Veetrirukkiravarukku Munbaaga Vanakkamaai Vizhundhu, Sadhaakaalangalilum Uyirodirukkiravaraith Thozhudhukondu, Thangal Kireedangalaich Singaasanaththirkumunbaaga Vaiththu:

11 karththaave, Dhevareer, Magimaiyaiyum Ganaththaiyum Vallamaiyaiyum Petrukkollugiradharkup Paaththiraraayirukkireer, Neere Sagalaththaiyum Sirushtiththeer, Ummudaiya Siththaththinaale Avaigal Undaayirukkiravaigalum Sirushtikkappattavaigalumaayirukkiradhu Endraargal.
